alert.note: Alert for Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 03 at 2:34PM CST until January 04 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...West winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts around 60 mph. * WHERE...In Wyoming, Niobrara County. In Nebraska, Dawes County, Box Butte County, Northern Sioux County and Southern Sioux County. * WHEN...Winds will increase Tuesday morning and become strong late Tuesday morning. Strong winds will continue through early Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Mainly to transportation. Strong cross winds will be hazardous to light weight and high profile vehicles, including campers and tractor trailers.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe location prior to the onset of winds. A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Banner; Cheyenne; Kimball; Morrill; Scotts Bluff
